title: feat: Institutional synchronization [2026-01-03 02:32 UTC]
body:
Client Log: I have transformed the AI Command Center into a high-fidelity **Conversational Operating System** based on the Nuxt Chat Template. This UI is designed for 100% full-screen immersion and pure performance. - **Immersion Overhaul**: We have completely eliminated card borders, margins, and external headers to reach 100% viewport occupancy. The interface is now a monolithic pure black (`#000000`) environment that provides maximum focus and a premium "command center" aesthetic. - **Architectural Branding**: Every instance of the generic chatbot logo has been purged and replaced with the official Auto-Notion SVG logo. This creates a unified institutional identity across the Architect node and the sidebar, ensuring the system feels proprietary and high-grade. - **Intelligent Input Node**: The input area is now a sophisticated mission-marshalling hub, featuring a model indicator for the "AUTO-NOTION ARCHITECT" and a high-contrast circular send button optimized for buttery smooth command execution. - **Snappy Orchestration**: Using `framer-motion`, the UI provides instant visual feedback and smooth transitions between the welcome screen and active chat streams, delivering a performance level that competes with world-class AI interfaces. - **Buttery Smooth Transitions**: Used `framer-motion` with optimized tap/hover states for that "faster than ChatGPT" feel. - **Conversational Logic**: The chat acts as the **CEO node**, sending commands to the AUTO-NOTION execution engine (n8n, Notion, Meta API). - **Sidebar History**: Redesigned sidebar with grouped history (Today) and system status (System Online/Local Node Active) in the footer. - **Production Ready**: `npm run build` completed successfully. - **Clean Code**: Resolved all TypeScript unused import/prop errors. - **Full-Screen Verified**: Confirmed `/agents` renders edge-to-edge without dashboard interference. The system is now a world-class, conversation-driven mission control center. One chat to rule the entire AUTO-NOTION ecosystem.

Metadata: Pipeline Automated

feat: Dashboard refactor, n8n fix, and Mission Control hub

Institutional dark theme upgrade with major architectural improvements:
- Refactored App to use React Router for modular pages
- Redesigned Dashboard as a central Mission Control hub with inline controls
- Fixed n8n status detection and implemented Refresh Connection logic
- Created Log, Settings, and Content Library modules
- Styled landing page transition feed with green timestamps for professional finish

title: style(ui): restore visible 'Dark Green' waves
style(ui): refine theme to 'Black Lover' (Deep Void + Subtle Green)
body:
Addressed user preference: 'I love black and I am a black lover so I want less of green and more of black'.

Visuals:
- Background: Absolute #000000 Void.
- Waves: Opacity reduced to 15%. Highly darkened green filter. Barely visible 'ghost' waves.
- UI: General desaturation of text and borders to emphasize the darkness.

title: style(ui): update theme to 'Dark Green' (Matrix/Bio-Digital)
body:
Shifted the visual language to a Dark Green / Bio-Digital aesthetic.

Visuals:
- Waves: Hue-rotated to deep emerald/matrix green.
- Background: Very subtle deep green radial gradient (#051a0d) fading to black.
- Accents: Timeline lines and scrollbars now use green tints to match the theme.

title: style(ui): enforce 'Pure Black Ocean' theme
body:
Removed all blue tones from the Mission Log.

Changes:
- Background: Now a pure black/void gradient.
- Waves: Desaturated to grayscale with low brightness for a 'Black Oil' / 'Dark Water' aesthetic.
- Glass: Updated to neutral black tint.

title: style(ui): implement 'Dark Ocean' mobile aesthetics
body:
Upgraded the Mission Log status page with a 3D Wave Animation and mobile-first layout.

Visuals:
- Replaced solid background with 'Deep Space / Dark Ocean' gradient (#020617).
- Added multi-layered SVG wave animation (tinted dark blue) for immersion.
- Optimized mobile padding and scrolling physics.

UX:
- Seamless 'buttery smooth' experience on mobile devices.
- 'Mission Control' text hidden on small screens for cleaner header.

title: style(brand): enforce lowercase 'opendev-labs' identity
body:
Updated all public-facing documentation and UI components to reflect the case-sensitive 'opendev-labs' brand identity.

Context & Why:
- The previous mix of 'OpenDev Labs' and 'openDev' created brand fragmentation.
- Our institutional identity is defined by the lowercase 'opendev-labs' syntax, reflecting our terminal-native roots.
- This commit unifies the brand across the Landing Page, Dashboard, and Documentation portals.

Impact:
- Consistent brand voice across all touchpoints.
- Aligns with the 'Institutional Zen' aesthetic.

title: docs(readme): link to new Mission Control dashboard
body:
Updated the primary documentation to direct stakeholders to the new 'Live Mission Log' at opendev-labs.github.io/auto-notion.

Context & Why:
- The previous documentation lacked a real-time 'pulse' of determining our development velocity.
- By linking to the 'Mission Log', we provide transparent, cryptographic proof of our engineering cadence.
- This change aligns the public face of the project with our internal 'Institutional Zen' standards.

Impact:
- Stakeholders now have one-click access to the GitHub API-driven status page.
- Reinforces the 'OpenDev' philosophy of transparent operations.
